name: Noctua NH-D15
description: The NH-D15 is Noctua's flagship model, an elite-class dual tower cooler for the highest demands in cooling performance.

name: Cooler Master Hyper 212 EVO
description: A legendary air cooler providing a great balance of performance and price for mainstream builds.

name: be quiet! Dark Rock Pro 4
description: No-compromise silent cooling for overclocked systems and demanding workstations.

name: Corsair H100i RGB PLATINUM
description: A 240mm All-In-One liquid CPU cooler with vivid RGB lighting and extreme cooling performance.

name: NZXT Kraken X63
description: This All-in-One (AIO) liquid cooler is designed with the ability to fit comfortably in most cases and features a stunning infinity mirror effect.
